properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 90 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT,
REQUESTING ASSISTANCE VICINITY 34-12N 013-29E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
